document_data.caption: An earthwind ravager, thunderblast cyclone, firelasher, and rockfire dreadnought.
document_data.name: Elemental
document_data.location:
[[Elemental Chaos|The Elemental Chaos]], [[Prime Material Plane]]
{{Former}} [[Elemental plane|The elemental planes]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Elementals''' were [[outsider]]s that embodied the [[element]]s of the [[elemental planes]].

Varieties.Para-Elementals:
[[Para-elemental]]s were from the paraelemental planes, where the borders of the elemental planes intersected.
* [[Ice para-elemental]]
* [[Magma para-elemental]]
* [[Ooze para-elemental]]
* [[Smoke para-elemental]]
